original_text: “You shall make a lampstand of pure gold. The lampstand shall be made of hammered work: its base, its stem, its cups, its calyxes, and its flowers shall be of one piece with it.
korean_text: 너는 순금으로 등잔대를 쳐 만들되 그 밑판과 줄기와 잔과 꽃받침과 꽃을 한 덩이로 연결하고

sentences.original_text: You shall make a lampstand of pure gold.
The lampstand shall be made of hammered work:
its base, its stem, its cups, its calyxes, and its flowers
sentences.korean_translation: 그 밑받침과 줄기와 잔과 꽃받침과 꽃은

sentences.original_text: shall be of one piece with it.
